title: Honour update!
body: Alright so good job with the honour update it looks sick unfortunately once again you have screwed up (becoming a bit of a habit don't you think). So like i said it looks great but where the hell is our previous honour?? oh right 'Gone to' that's all you have for us? I have played for quite a few years and have amassed a ton of honour. More then most people who have played for the same or even longer time than i have. Now its gone. no record of it not even a little boost in the new system not an icon for different amounts of honour people obtained in the old system. nothing. So thanks for scrapping years of being a non toxic player much appreciated think i might turn over a new leaf and be toxic now since apparently it doesn't matter.
